etc.aloe.processes
Interface LabelMapping

All Known Implementing Classes:
LabelMappingImpl
public interface LabelMapping

LabelMapping maps predicted labels onto un-classified messages, producing labeled messages.

Method Summary
 void map(Predictions predictions, SegmentSet segments)
          Modifies the message set with predicted labels based on the provided labels and segments.
 

Method Detail

map

void map(Predictions predictions,
         SegmentSet segments)
Modifies the message set with predicted labels based on the provided labels and segments. The predictions are superimposed over the raw messages to produce the output.

Parameters:
predictions - Predictions produced by a model
segments - The unlabeled segments, whose messages will receive the new labels.
